raw_body: BROHIER – DESMOND PERCIVAL – Beloved husband of late Ramya Brohier,​ darling father of Shannon Brohier,​ brother of Jerome & Elorine,​ brother-in-law of Mayura,​ Chandrika,​ Chandralal,​ Kapila,​ Asitha,​ Irshani,​ Thilakaratne,​ Shiromi,​ Kumudini,​ Nilanthi,​ Tilak Wickremasinghe,​ son of Doris Brohier and late Ernie Brohier,​ son-in-law of late George and late Hemamala Gunawardena,​ passedaway peacefully. Remains lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour from 09.30 a.m. on Tuesday,​ 16th January. Burial at 3.30 p.m. on 17th January 2024 at the Anglican Section,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella.003850
